well i never got to write about my awesome weekend. i saw OSCAR on saturday, it was great. we just went to busch and spent the afternoon by ourselves. it was our first weekend just by ourselves, it was great. we just walked around and watched all the shows, since we never saw any of them. we went to the mind over magic thingy and umm that thing was umm retarded. we were just laughin at it cuz it didn't make any sense. it was really great seeing him since we hadn't seen eachother in like 2 weeks.

then yesterday i went to sinta's house in kiln creek to go trick or treating with the kids. my little brother got alot of candy, the people in kiln creek gave out real candy not the lil snack sized ones. it was hot. but yea i think that was all about sunday. not too much happened.

umm today i started behind the wheel. umm i didn't think i was that bad of a driver until she started talking about it... maybe its just cause i'm not used to the car yet. i seem to drift to the right alot. i don't kno why. and i zoned out a couple times. i def need to work on that. i just don't like the car that we're using cuz its just big compared to my car.and the gas peddle is so damn sensitive every time i pressed on it the car would jerk. pissed me off. but yea i think i suck at driving at this point. it will get better tho.

i have such an awesome boyfriend :)

well i haven't written much lately. not like anyone cares. umm we carved pumpkins the other day. mine is too cool for school, yo! it was a vampire. i umm skipped class today, fun stuff the lady from odu came and talked to us. i'm def. thinking about goin there. so yea i didn't go back to class. went to second lunch with felix and jonathan. just chilled with them and talked. lol i was laughing with them and i snorted out of no where, lol they were makin fun of me. :( yea me and felix had a conversation about my feelings toward a certain subject. lol then he was makin fun of me about it. thanx, good friend. umm well roberts in my chemistry class and he tells me that i'm his best friend like everyday...so yea i guess he's my best friend too. lol he said "yea i see u as a sister" lol i thought it was funny. and kinda gross account of our past. lol 

umm i'm gonna see oscar tomorrow :) i'm excited

survey:

http://hokev.brinkster.net/quiz/default.asp?quiz=Better+Relationship&page=1

eXpressive: 6/10
Practical: 2/10
Physical: 4/10
Giver: 7/10

You are a XSIG--Expressive Sentimental Intellectual Giver. This makes you a Teddy Bear.

Hee! I just want to give you a big squeeze. You are tender, honest, generous and fair. You are an excellent kisser and a sensitive, communicative lover, and you know it. You would never intentionally hurt someone's feelings or overstep his/her boundaries. You have beautiful eyes.

Most people take your laid-back attitude, blazing wit and subtle sexiness and stick you in "friend." But some see your extreme hotness for what it is and latch on. This means you have a few members of your target sex in the bank at all times -- I call this "money in the sex bank" -- but you're too sensitive and thoughtful to exploit them. More than once.

You are so rational and deliberate in an argument that it can frustrate and exhaust your partner. Your fights can take forever, but your press on with them until they are completely resolved and both you and your partner are satisfied. If your partner is weak of will, s/he may just give in -- be wary of this! An emotional or passive-aggressive outburst later will hurt and horrify you.

It is *critically important* that you are able to respect your partner. The moment you lose respect for him/her, you lose everything.

When you make friends, you make them for life -- you can go without speaking to a friend for years and pick up right where you left off. You are completely faithful, both physically and emotionally. You are the second best (to XPIG) parent of any type.

If you are male, you have a huge shlong. Just saying. (too bad i'm not a male)

Of the 141603 people who have taken this quiz, 8.1 % are this type.

umm alright well i'm incredibly bored and have nothing to do so yea this is probably gonnna be a shit entry so feel free to stop reading ANYTIME :-D

well yesterday i was incredibly hyper the WHOLE day. i was getting hyped for the pep rally... which wasn't that great. but before last period i was dancing in the hallway and the security guard was just watchin me and he was like "are u ok, do u need to go to the bathroom?" i was like "no i'm fine!" i just couldn't keep all of my hyperness in so i was acting crazy. lol it was funny tho. yea i was dancing all day. everyone was just like u should go to homecoming cuz i've just been dancing like crazy lately. but yea. umm last night went out to dinner with the family to jade buffet. i don't think the guy understood any english cuz i never got my steak knife. :-/ he sucks! lol but then after we had to go to my moms store for a while cuz she wanted me to do something with the computer there. then went to the mall, got an application for old navy. fun stuff. yea i saw devon at work, didn't get to say hey or talk or anything. maybe next time. then came home talked on the phone with oscar til like maybe midnight and i went straight to sleep after cuz i was so tired then at like one dan called. lol it was really funny cuz mark and david were hangin out with him to. then he hung up on me and never called back... thanx dan. lol. good times talking to dan... we used to have the funniest conversations at work. i miss wcusa. :( DAN HOOD... funny. lol then went back to sleep and froze in bed. it was great. lol

then today at like 11 we went over mrs. gladys house. its my moms friend shes real old and its just real depressing but she's awesome. shes a cool old lady. we just stayed for like an hour and now we are back. FUN FUN FUN.

that has got to be my favoritest songs right now. anyway. umm not anything that sticks out has happened lately. spirit week this week. our hall looks nice and everything its just so overly decorated and the hall feels so small. but it looks really nice. good job whoever did that. lol our theme is GREEK PARADISE. i'm in love with greece so its a cool idea. lol on one of our walls it says MY BIG FAT GREEK HOMECOMING. and then we have windex bottles hanging from the wall. its great. our halls are so decorated. it looks real nice except on b hall, wuts up with the mountains near the lockers, please help me understand someone! can't wait til tomorrow, hc assembly and PEP RALLLYYYYY!! i'm excited, pep rallys are so much fun.

well i start behind the wheel next month (nov. 1) i'm excited cuz 2 weeks after that my nine months are up and i can start driving on my own.... yeaaaa budddyyy. i can't wait. :-D

k well yesterday was a boring day. cleaned up in the morning and took a morning nap, then talked to oscar for a lil. i was supposed to go to the mall with felix and jonathan so i could see wut they're gonna wear to homecoming but they never called so i went to my aunts house instead. lots of food. so yea i ate, and we were watchin cold mountain. it was a good movie. in the middle of the movie jaron* called, very upsetting. told me things i didn't wanna hear and basically made me wanna cry. i hate when he calls out of no where. he only calls like once a month just to see how i'm doin and the convo always ends up with me being upset. then came home and talked to oscar. then went to bed. * for the people that don't kno who jaron is... first and only black guy i've ever dated. broke up with me twice and next day ended up with another girl. THE NEXT DAY!after the second time me and him broke up i told him straight up that i would NEVER go back out with him just to avoid getting hurt again. he would ask me out pretty much every day and always got the same answer...no. one time he practically begged me. it was funny. everytime he called me he would always tell me he loved me and at one point i did, but why would he have hurt me if he "loved" me. he ended up moving to portsmouth back with his mom and for awhile he stopped calling so i pretty much started to stop thinking about him and moving on. but everytime i start to forget about him he always calls. and tells me that we'll be together again or some other bs. when he called last night it was a complete surprise and it was weird because i kinda forgot about him. but of course he basically told me the same old bull that he used to and he said he meant it. sure he did. i told him that i have a boyfriend and that nothing will happen between me and him (jaron) ever again. he needs to stop calling me. k i'm done. what does nostalgic mean?

well last night i went to the movies with oscar, kara, and her boyfriend. i forgot his name :-X opps. we went to see shark tale. good movie :) ahh and there were previews of a penguin movie omg i HAVE to see it. i'll be the first one in line! lol. j/k but i kno i'm gonna see it. then after the movies, we all didn't want to go home yet cuz it was still early so we went to the fountains in oyster point. omg it was freezing. but it was pretty. the water kept blowing our way. lol. yea and the great thing about it is that me and oscar are both sick. great idea for me right? yea i kno. but i don't think the coldness made us any sicker. I'm glad i got to see oscar, makes the week of waiting to see him worth it. :)

yesterday i talked to felix and jonathan about all of us hanging out but i haven't heard anything about it so i dunno. jonathan was talking about wanting to see friday night lights. my mom told me that were goin to my auntie aida's house tonight and i kinda don't want to cuz its super boring there. so hopefully they call with plans.

uhh i think thats it.

well i haven't written in awhile. this weeks gone by so slowly. had psats on wednesday, fun fun fun. then after school me and jenn went to jaclyn's house and did the posters for fbla. oh my gah, so ugly. lol umm today was so boring. i was so tired today. my mom made me take medicine for my cough last night. it's like a crazy sleeping pill. i was tired, last night this morning and this afternoon. i'm never taking it again. i'd ratehr have a cough then by abnormaly tired. its great. uhhh. 

tomorrow i'm gonna see my baby :) we're gonna see shark tales. yayyyyyyy. my moms been letting me go out alot lately. makes me happy cuz it just makes it show that she trusts me again. even tho my dad probably doesn't. don't know why. but yea i'm excited. :)

well i'm gonna go to my room now and watch some tv and probably talk on the phone.

friday: went to visit jenn cuz she had her teeh pulled out. chris m. and jonathan were there just chilled and watched the goonies. then got picked up around 6 went to auntie aida's house. so boring then zarah and ritchelyn stopepd by, gave me people to talk to. went thru old pics found a pic of nate when he had just moved here. HOT SHIT! lol umm then went home, talked on the phone and slept.

saturday: woke up early 8 to be exact. cleaned the house, washed my clothes. went to my moms friends house for a mary kay party thing. got new make up :) my aunt did my hair for hc, it was ok at first but as the night passed i thought it was ugly. lol oh well tough cookies. lol went to dinner then colonial williamsburg and walked around with oscar, thomas and his date lauren, oh she's so pretty and so funny. i think they're perfect for eachother. oscar lost his flower but i found it! go me! lol then went to homecoming. it was fun. spent time with my baby :) always fun. they dont have alot of people at their school. but oh well still fun. some girl got arrested, cool beans! me and oscar started goin out. :)

it was real fun.

i met up with my sups. mark and jenn but i didn't get to hang out with them :( i'm really sorry guys i really did wanna hang out with u guys! i really miss u guys. sorry again :(

anyway... met some bruton people. nice funny kids. chilled with oscar :), becky, nate, and courtney most of the time.  good times. we went into the haunted house at pompeii and i got followed by like 3 of the monsters. i think they knew me? ugh scared the shit out of me. and then while we were leaving there was this freakin guy chasing me and i was runnin around in circles and slipped. lol it was so funny. but i feel on my knees. it hurts :-X then we all went to second street to eat. good food. then after second street everything went down hill. i got nate and becky mad at me :( sorry guys!! really i'm sooooooooooooo sorry!!! then my parents got mad at me. my mom was bitchin at me in the car... admitting to me that she doesn't trust me at all. she didn't really tell me but i could tell by wut she was sayin that she doesn't. i haven't done anything for her not to trust me :-/ it sucks. they need to let me go.

umm i don't really wanna type to much anymore.

 

but sorry to everyone. tomorrow guess i wasn't too good at makin people happy yesterday. but i'm glad i got to spend time with my baby :)

HE IS FUCKIN SHADY! don't mean to be mean but how? thats all imma say with the question cuz the rest of my words are harsh... beyond harsh. kid is bad news. drives me completly insane. but i am very happy now. :)

so yea, yesterday i went to busch. 10-10 long ass time. but it was fun. :) chilled with the church. i thought it would be pretty lame but it was fun. chilled with joamarie most of the time. rode some rides. then we had mass (it was youth catholic day at busch.) me and jo were just basically patiently waiting for the bruton football game to be over so adam and oscar would hurry up and see us. they got there around 6:30. :)got on the haunted train thing. that thing was lame. then met up with becky and nate at the smoke house after. then we all went to the haunted house near the festhouse (yea i can't spell) lol i was like running thru that i was soo scared. lol got hit in the face with like tons of stuff. i'm glad oscar was there. :)

but yea i'm just gonna type out the anger i had at one point. yesterday was supposed to be a group activity. unity within the youth group. don't think that since u were with your girlfriend that u can wander off and do u'r own thing. thats so rude and it pissed me off. me and jo were there with guys but u didn't see us leaving the rest of the group. if we're goin one way u should suck it up even u don't want to and just go with us. don't whine about where u want to go. u ruined the mood in the group and i was really close to screaming. u shouldn't ruin a group thing just so u could be happy. u have to learn to compromise. the world doesn't revolove around u. u made urself look like an ass.

k thats all :)
